name: 吳宇凡
objective:
本課程涵蓋數位時代中一手檔案史料的整理與數位化過程，著重檔案資料的典藏管理與加值應用。課程目標在於培養學生的檔案智能，包括：1. 認識檔案資料類型與特性，以及數位保存的相關概念；2. 理解檔案編排分類與描述著錄等資訊組織的基本原則3. 具備檔案資料查找、評估與運用數位典藏等檔案專業素養。
This course will introduce the basic concepts and practical issues in modern archives administration. And then, focus on the long-term preservation and open access of digital archives. By attending the class students will: (1) Understand basic concepts of archival materials relating to digital preservation. (2) Gain in-deep understanding the principles of archives arrangement and information organization. (3) Possess the archival intelligence to find, evaluate and use the digital information.
schedule:
WEEK 01：課程簡介／INTRODUCTION
WEEK 02：檔案類型與國內外重要典藏機構／TYPES OF ARCHIVES AND ARCHIVAL INSTITUTIONS
WEEK 03：民間文書類型及其史料價值（土地契書、人身契字...等家族檔案）／TYPES AND VALUES OF PRIVATE PAPERS
WEEK 04：圖像史料（明信片、寫真帖、照片、地圖、美術畫作...等）／IMAGE MATERIAL
WEEK 05：檔案徵集與入藏／ACQUISITION
WEEK 06：運動會補假／DEFERRED HOLIDAY
WEEK 07：檔案編排原則與分類實務／ARRANGEMENT AND CLASSIFICATION
WEEK 08：檔案描述與METADATA著錄／DESCRIPTION AND METADATA
WEEK 09：期中報告／REPORT
WEEK 10：檔案保存與修復／REPAIRING AND RESTORING
WEEK 11：數位典藏導論／DIGITAL ARCHIVES
WEEK 12：檔案機構參訪（檔案數位化作業流程）／INSTITUTION VISIT
WEEK 13：數位典藏系統建置／DIGITAL ARCHIVING SYSTEM
WEEK 14：檔案內容數位加值／VALUE ADDED
WEEK 15：檔案展覽策展／CURATION
WEEK 16：檔案與文化創意產業發展／DEVELOPMENT OF CULTURE AND CREATIVE INDUSTRY
WEEK 17：期末報告／REPORT & EVALUATE
WEEK 18：期末報告／REPORT & EVALUATE
